body_html: http://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/teams/new will be hit quite often in the coming days and that one looks particularly evil. I mean it works, but it ain't pretty. If there is someone who could at least make the radio buttons + their labels look passable, that would be greatly appreciated 😄

body: http://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/teams/new will be hit quite often in the coming days and that one looks particularly evil. I mean it _works_, but it ain't pretty.
